bug.author: shantanuchhabra
bug.summary: Significance of denominator while annotating labels
bug.description: The "/10" for each label does not make sense and does not have any tooltip/help text for it. What is the significance of 10? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14062641/53989028-d0ff8b80-40d9-11e9-856a-6ded69b9c40a.png></denchmark-link>
